sentence: Despite Kemp's break from Trump, he shares no such break with the U.S. Senate primary winner Herschel Walker, whom Trump endorsed and won easily Tuesday evening.
author: Salena Zito
title: Ignoring the Noise and Running on Good Governing Are the Biggest Lessons of Georgia

sentence: "But just like his record of skyrocketing inflation, wallet busting gas prices, or surging crime in our communities, the voters of Georgia see what Warnock has done and it's why they're going to elect a true leader and problem solver in Herschel Walker come November," Lawson continued.
author: Jessica Chasmar
title: Warnock pushes Georgia voting suppression claims, despite voters shattering turnout records
